revision.comment: Added the CPU test ROMs (for completeness). Added SHA-1 for M.A.C.H. 3 target ROM.

Updated for Daphne 0.99.7.
In addition to games mentioned in the changelog... added galaxyp, badlandh, dle21, lgp and timetrav (all new since 0.99.6).

Updated for Daphne 0.99.6.
Accurately reflects the number of games available and ROMs required but see comments in the data file for extra details.
Renamed dle->dle11, added badlands.c4 and removed badlands.c13 to/from badlands.
Was missing Bega's Battle (2 revisions) in the last release.

Updated for Daphne v0.99.5a.
Added Dragons Lair (enhanced release 2.0) and Cliffhanger (alternate).

Updated for Daphne v0.99.5.
Added Space Ace enhanced and upgraded Space Ace to rev 3.
Also added some PROMs and improved the merging of blazer/galaxy.
Daphne v0.99.4 (added Badlands and Goal to Go).
